Chicago's Third-Tallest Tower: Where Architectural Brilliance Meets Lakefront Luxury Experience the pinnacle of sophisticated urban living in Studio Gang's crystalline masterpiece, a 101-story icon soaring above Lake Michigan, offering 360-degree views and unparalleled St. Regis service. St Regis The Residences at St. Regis Chicago Chicago st-regis-chicago 2021-10-15 The Residences at St. Regis Chicago: Jeanne Gang's Shimmering Gemstone Redefining Luxury Living Welcome to The Residences at St. Regis Chicago, where architectural innovation converges with legendary hospitality. Designed by internationally acclaimed architect Jeanne Gang of Studio Gang, this 101-story crystalline tower stands as Chicago's third-tallest building and the world's tallest structure designed by a woman-led team. Rising majestically from the prestigious Lakeshore East neighborhood, the building's three interconnected masses reach skyward at 47, 71, and 93 stories, creating a distinctive silhouette that recalls the brilliance of a multi-faceted gemstone catching light across the skyline.

This extraordinary development offers 393 uniquely crafted residences, ranging from sophisticated one-bedroom sanctuaries to expansive five-bedroom penthouses spanning up to 6,800 square feet. Each home showcases meticulous attention to detail, with interiors by world-renowned Hirsch Bedner Associates featuring gourmet kitchens by Snaidero USA with Gaggenau and Thermador appliances, spa-inspired bathrooms with Kallista fixtures, and color palettes inspired by precious stones, sapphire, amethyst, topaz, and fluorite. Residents enjoy the ultimate address where bespoke St. Regis service, a dedicated 47th-floor amenity level, and direct access to the five-star hotel create an uncompromising standard of luxury living. A Crystalline Vision: Where Architectural Poetry Meets the Chicago Sky Jeanne Gang's visionary design transforms the ordinary into the extraordinary, drawing inspiration from the natural brilliance of gemstones to create an architectural landmark that captures and refracts light across the Chicago skyline. The tower's form, a seemingly undulating crystalline façade, is achieved through an ingenious interplay of geometric frustums and six varying shades of blue-green glass, chosen to mirror the ever-changing moods of Lake Michigan. This is not simply a building; it is a living sculpture that breathes with the city, each angle revealing new facets, new perspectives, and new connections to the water and sky beyond.

The architectural philosophy extends beyond aesthetic beauty to embrace sustainability and innovation. More than 75% of construction materials were diverted back into manufacturing processes, while the structure's stepped profile and perimeter columns that move inward and outward create unique spaces within each residence—no two homes are identical. Gang's approach celebrates Chicago's rich architectural heritage while boldly advancing it into the future. Here, at the confluence of the Chicago River and Lake Michigan, residents inhabit spaces that feel simultaneously grounded in the natural world and elevated above it, where every window frames not just a view but a constantly evolving panorama of urban and natural grandeur. The Pinnacle of Prestige: 101 Stories of Uncompromising Luxury • Location: 363 East Wacker Drive
• Height & Distinction: 1,198 feet, 101 stories—Chicago's third-tallest building
• Residences: 393 luxury condominiums
• Layouts: One to five-bedroom homes, including full-floor Sky 360 penthouses with 360-degree views
• Interior Design: Hirsch Bedner Associates with custom millwork by Snaidero USA, premium Gaggenau and Thermador appliances, Kallista fixtures
• Architecture: Designed by Jeanne Gang, Studio Gang Architects; structural engineering by Magnusson Klemencic Associates
• Completion: 2020, with ongoing sales of exclusive residences
• Developer: Magellan Development Group in partnership with Parcel C LLC under St. Regis licensing The 47th Floor Sanctuary: An Entire Level Devoted to Your Every Desire Ascend to an oasis where wellness, entertainment, and social connection converge with breathtaking views across a dedicated 47,000-square-foot amenity floor. The entire forty-seventh floor transforms luxury living into an art form, offering residents a private retreat elevated above the city. Step onto the expansive sky terrace featuring an outdoor swimming pool and spa, surrounded by a serene Zen garden terrace where you can unwind while drinking in panoramic vistas of Lake Michigan, the Chicago River, and the glittering cityscape. Inside, the residents' lounge and private dining room provide elegant venues for intimate gatherings, while the demonstration kitchen and wine-tasting room invite culinary adventures. Golf enthusiasts can perfect their swing in the state-of-the-art golf simulator, while the conference center accommodates professional needs with sophisticated style. A private cinema offers entertainment in an intimate setting, and the children's activity room ensures younger residents have their own dedicated space for play and creativity.

Beyond the 47th floor, residents enjoy seamless access to the five-star St. Regis Hotel's exceptional amenities. The hotel's 5,600-square-foot fitness center features cutting-edge equipment, yoga studios, and training spaces, complemented by steam and sauna rooms. The St. Regis Spa provides world-class treatments, while the indoor pool offers year-round aquatic indulgence. Additional conveniences include 24-hour concierge service, on-demand Tesla vehicles, a dog lounge with an indoor run, receiving room for packages, and direct access to two acclaimed restaurants, Miru, featuring Japanese cuisine by Chef Hisanobu Osaka, and Tre Dita, a Tuscan steakhouse by Chef Evan Funke. As the mastermind behind the award-winning Lakeshore East master-planned community, Magellan has demonstrated an unwavering commitment to architectural excellence, urban innovation, and quality of life. The firm's collaboration with visionary architects, from hiring Jeanne Gang to design both the acclaimed Aqua Tower and The St. Regis Chicago, showcases their dedication to pushing architectural boundaries while maintaining the highest standards of construction and resident experience.

The St. Regis Chicago represents Magellan's most ambitious achievement to date, bringing together world-class design, legendary St. Regis hospitality, and the prime location at the intersection of Chicago's river and lakefront. Under Magellan's stewardship, the development secured strategic partnerships, navigated complex urban planning approvals, and delivered a supertall tower that respects Chicago's architectural heritage while boldly advancing it. Their attention to detail extends from selecting premium materials and finishes to curating amenities that anticipate residents' every need. With The St. Regis Chicago, Magellan has created not just another luxury address, but an icon that will define sophisticated urban living for generations to come.

Where legendary elegance meets Singapore's most prestigious address. St Regis St. Regis Residences Singapore Singapore st-regis-singapore 2018-10-18 St. Regis Residences Singapore: A Legacy of Uncompromising Luxury on Tanglin Road Nestled in the heart of Singapore's most coveted District 10, St. Regis Residences represents the harmonious union of legendary hospitality and exceptional residential design. This distinguished 999-year leasehold development, completed in 2008, comprises two elegant 23-storey towers housing 173 exquisite residences, each a masterpiece of contemporary architecture and refined living. Adjacent to the renowned St. Regis Hotel, this exclusive address places residents mere steps from Orchard Road's world-famous shopping district while maintaining an atmosphere of serene privacy and sophistication.

Developed by Richmond Hotel Pte Ltd, a prestigious joint venture between City Developments Limited, Hong Leong Holdings Limited, and TID Pte Ltd, these residences embody over six decades of development excellence. Every sky villa and sky suite has been meticulously crafted to deliver not merely accommodation, but an unparalleled lifestyle. From the moment you arrive, the inspired details and exquisite ambience reveal themselves as more than prelude; they define a new standard of urban living where every need is anticipated and every pleasure fulfilled. A Timeless Retreat Where Sumptuous Beauty Meets Incomparable Design The vision behind St. Regis Residences transcends conventional luxury. Here, architectural excellence converges with the storied heritage of the St. Regis brand, a name synonymous with the finest in private residences worldwide. Each residence has been conceived as an unparalleled retreat of refined grace, where minimalist facades belie the extraordinary opulence within. Sky villas adorned with breathtaking vistas create a sanctuary above the city, while thoughtfully appointed interiors showcase state-of-the-art efficiency married to elegant aesthetics.

This is living elevated to art form. Behind the contemporary exterior lies a world where no feature is too extravagant, no detail too insignificant. From meticulously crafted bathroom fixtures by Dornbracht, world leaders in high-end design, to the sophisticated wardrobe systems by Truggelmann of Germany, every element reflects impeccable taste. The architectural vision embraces both form and function, creating residences where style and livability unite seamlessly. This is not simply a place to reside; it is the perfect extension of your own highly refined world, positioned at one of the world's most sophisticated addresses. Every desire fulfilled. Experience a lifestyle where sophistication meets convenience through St. Regis's legendary tradition of personalized excellence. At St. Regis Residences, you don't simply live, you experience a curated lifestyle perfected over a century of hospitality heritage. The crown jewel of residential amenities is the renowned St. Regis Butler Service, an unparalleled offering that remains unsurpassed anywhere in the world. Your personal butler anticipates every need with flawless, personalized attention, from unpacking luggage and delivering morning coffee to coordinating in-residence services and arranging special occasions. This living legacy of founder John Jacob Astor IV's vision ensures that the rare luxury of time itself becomes yours.

Beyond butler service, residents enjoy access to an exceptional array of facilities designed for rejuvenation and leisure. Relax poolside at the resort-style swimming pool and deck, perfect for unwinding against a backdrop of tropical landscaping. Maintain your wellness routine at the fully-equipped gymnasium featuring state-of-the-art equipment and stunning views. The development's three-level basement carpark provides secure, convenient access. Additional lifestyle amenities include BBQ areas for intimate gatherings, lush landscaped gardens, and 24-hour security for complete peace of mind. Every element has been thoughtfully designed to create an environment where luxury living meets effortless convenience, all within the embrace of the world's most distinguished residential brand. Central Business District Built by Visionaries: The CDL Legacy of Excellence City Developments Limited (CDL) St. Regis Residences Singapore is brought to life by Richmond Hotel Pte Ltd, a distinguished joint venture uniting three titans of Singapore real estate: City Developments Limited (CDL), Hong Leong Holdings Limited, and TID Pte Ltd. This powerhouse collaboration combines over 60 years of CDL's unparalleled expertise with the financial strength and development acumen of Hong Leong Holdings and TID's specialized knowledge. CDL stands as Singapore's property pioneer and a leading global real estate company, with an extensive network spanning 168 locations across 29 countries. As one of Singapore Exchange's largest companies by market capitalization, CDL has developed over 53,000 homes and owns approximately 23 million square feet of residential, commercial, and hospitality assets globally. The developer's commitment to excellence is reflected in its unprecedented achievement: winning the EdgeProp Singapore Excellence Awards' Top Developer honor for eight consecutive years, a record no other developer has matched. Beyond shaping Singapore's skyline with architectural icons, CDL has transformed the nation's built environment through pioneering green building innovations and has been recognized with the prestigious BCA Green Mark Platinum Champion Award. This legacy of quality, sustainability, and visionary development ensures that St. Regis Residences represents not just a home, but an enduring testament to Singapore's finest residential craftsmanship.

Where Pristine Nature Meets Uncompromising Four Seasons Luxury Discover an extraordinary collection of private residences along Samaná Bay's untouched shores, where tropical modernist architecture by Isay Weinfeld honors the land's natural splendor while elevating Caribbean living to unprecedented heights. Four Seasons Four Seasons Residences Tropicalia Dominican Republic four-seasons-tropicalia 2026-01-01 Four Seasons Residences Tropicalia: Where Sustainable Elegance Transforms the Dominican Republic's Southern Coast Four Seasons Private Residences Dominican Republic at Tropicalia represents a transformative vision for Caribbean luxury living. Positioned along the pristine southern coast of Samaná Bay, this exclusive enclave of just 25 private residences redefines what it means to find sanctuary in paradise. Developed by Cisneros Real Estate and bearing the legendary Four Seasons name, Tropicalia is conceived as more than a residence; it is a philosophy of living that honors simplicity, privacy, and environmental stewardship while delivering the world's most distinguished hospitality standards.

The development emerges from a landscape meticulously preserved for its biodiversity and historical significance. Every element has been thoughtfully designed to protect the diverse ecosystem of beaches, aquamarine waters, lush forests, and mangroves that make this corner of the Dominican Republic so exceptional. Tropicalia serves as a model for sustainable, low-density development, proving that luxury and environmental responsibility can exist in perfect harmony. Here, residents discover not just a home, but a lasting legacy—a place where memories transcend generations and where the profound connection to nature becomes part of daily life. Architecture That Breathes: Isay Weinfeld's Vision of Seamless Tropical Modernism Brazilian master architect Isay Weinfeld has created something extraordinary at Tropicalia, structures that transcend mere buildings to become experiences in themselves. His tropical modernist vision merges seamlessly with space and time, containing the anticipation of countless moments yet to unfold. These are not residences that simply look beautiful; they feel beautiful, awakening something deeper in the soul. Each design element draws inspiration from the island's native materials and colonial heritage, creating a timeless sophistication touched by tropical grace. The nonlinear format encourages continuous discovery, as buildings integrate with the lush landscape to immerse residents fully in nature's embrace.

Weinfeld's profound understanding of comfortable tropical living manifests in intimate details that capture attention without demanding it, flow-through interiors that welcome ocean breezes, spaces that shift gracefully from indoor to outdoor living, and materials that honor the earth from which they came. His low-impact approach respects the land's integrity while maximizing enjoyment and wonder. The architecture creates what Weinfeld calls "structures merged with space and time," allowing life's most meaningful moments to unfurl gracefully and memorably. This is a design that doesn't impose itself upon nature but rather amplifies nature's inherent poetry, creating an ambiance where residents can truly find themselves again and again. Talaat Moustafa Group (TMG) has spent over 50 years establishing itself as Egypt's preeminent real estate visionary, developing more than 33 million square meters of land and creating homes for over 90,000 families. With a remarkable land bank exceeding 53 million square meters across Egypt's key cities, TMG pioneered the gated community concept that has transformed residential living throughout the region.

TMG's commitment to creating self-sustained, integrated communities has earned them recognition as one of the largest listed real estate development companies in Egypt and a leader throughout the Middle East. Their portfolio includes some of the nation's most prestigious addresses, from the groundbreaking Al Rabwa development in Sheikh Zayed City to the expansive Madinaty community. The partnership with Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts represents TMG's dedication to bringing world-class hospitality standards to residential living. Where Bangkok's Heritage Meets Timeless Tranquility An exclusive collection of 34 residences rising from an emerald sanctuary in the heart of Thailand's capital, where century-old jungle meets architectural mastery and the legendary Aman philosophy of peace. Aman Aman Residences Nai Lert Bangkok Bangkok, Thailand aman-bangkok 2025-12-01 Aman Residences Nai Lert Bangkok: A Private Urban Oasis Born from Legacy Nestled within the verdant embrace of historic Nai Lert Park on prestigious Wireless Road, Aman Residences Nai Lert Bangkok represents an unprecedented union of heritage, nature, and contemporary luxury. This 36-story architectural masterpiece, conceived by celebrated designer Jean-Michel Gathy, houses merely 34 residences above an intimate 52-suite Aman hotel, creating one of Asia's most exclusive residential addresses.

Since 1915, when visionary developer Nai Lert Sreshthaputra preserved this pristine tract of jungle as a private family sanctuary, the park has flourished into a serene city-center oasis. Today, under the stewardship of his great-granddaughter Naphaporn Bodiratnangkura, this living heart of Bangkok opens its canopy to a privileged few. Here, owners become part of Aman's distinguished global community while residing in spaces where every detail reflects the brand's Sanskrit-derived promise: peace. Available by invitation only, these residences offer not merely a home, but entry into a world where legacy meets luxury. A Sanctuary Suspended Between Canopy and Sky Jean-Michel Gathy's design philosophy for Aman Nai Lert Bangkok transcends conventional residential architecture, creating ethereal spaces that blur boundaries between interior and exterior, tradition and modernity. Each residence becomes a private pavilion floating above one of Bangkok's last urban jungles, where floor-to-ceiling windows dissolve walls into panoramas of emerald canopy and glittering cityscape. The architect has woven Thai cultural motifs into contemporary forms, honoring the site's century-old soul while embracing tomorrow's vision of urban living.

This is residential design as poetry, spaces that breathe with 3.2-meter ceilings and private terraces that extend living areas into the sky. Natural materials sourced from across continents complement bespoke furniture pieces, each surface and texture selected to create environments where residents experience the profound peace that defines the Aman way. Here, in this vertical sanctuary, luxury is measured not in ostentation but in space, silence, and the seamless integration of world-class service into daily life, creating homes that feel like personal retreats suspended between earth and heaven. Exclusivity Defined: Only 34 Residences Above Bangkok's Emerald Heart Total Residences: 34 private homes across 18 floors (floors 19-36)
Configuration Range: One-bedroom apartments to four-bedroom penthouses
Residence Sizes: From 127 square meters to an extraordinary 2,200 square meters
Ceiling Heights: Generous 3.2-meter ceilings throughout
Architectural Design: Jean-Michel Gathy of Denniston International
Location: Wireless Road, Lumpini, within historic Nai Lert Park (established 1915)
Hotel Integration: 52 Aman hotel suites on lower floors
Private Amenities: 30th-floor exclusive infinity pool, resident lounge, private dining room
Dedicated Staff: Personal chef and housekeeper for each residence
Wellness Center: Access to 1,500-square-meter Aman Spa & Medical Wellness by Hertitude Clinic An Elevated World of Privilege: Where Every Desire Anticipates Your Arrival From private infinity pools suspended above the city to healing sanctuaries combining ancient Thai wisdom with cutting-edge wellness, residents have access to an unparalleled realm of services and spaces. Residence ownership at Aman Nai Lert Bangkok unlocks a vertical sanctuary of world-class facilities designed exclusively for your wellbeing and pleasure. Your private 30th-floor infinity pool offers uninterrupted views across Bangkok's skyline, while dedicated resident lounges, complete with library, business center, and private dining room serviced by master chefs, become extensions of your home. The magnificent 1,500-square-meter Aman Spa & Wellness center anchors the experience, spanning two floors with 24-hour fitness facilities, six spa therapy rooms, dedicated Thai massage suites, extensive hydrotherapy facilities, and the exclusive Banya Spa House. Medical excellence meets holistic healing through the integrated Hertitude Clinic, featuring eight treatment rooms, an IV lounge, and a cryotherapy chamber.

Beyond wellness, residents enjoy privileged access to the hotel's celebrated 9th-floor infinity pool overlooking Nai Lert Park's emerald canopy, the sophisticated 1872 lounge bar, and signature Italian restaurant Arva. The exclusive 19th-floor open-air terrace, reserved for Aman Club Founders, hosts both the atmospheric Aman Lounge and intimate Cigar Bar. Every aspect of daily living—from 24/7 concierge and VIP assistance to complete maintenance, security, and optional rental program participation—ensures your residence remains a sanctuary of effortless tranquility. At the Intersection of Prestige and Possibility Nai Lert Park Heritage: featuring Nai Lert family heritage museum
Embassy District: Bangkok's most distinguished address
Central Business District: Minutes to Ploenchit and Chidlom BTS stations
Luxury Shopping: Walking distance to Central Embassy and Gaysorn Village
Fine Dining Scene: Bangkok's most celebrated restaurants across Langsuan and Wireless Road
International Schools: Proximity to premium educational institutions
Wellness Hub: Access to Bangkok's leading medical facilities and wellness centers in the Ploenchit-Wireless corridor A Legacy Born from Vision: The Nai Lert Group and Aman Unite The Nai Lert Group The union behind Aman Residences Nai Lert Bangkok represents two legacies of uncompromising excellence. The Nai Lert Group, founded in 1894 by Lert Sreshthaputra, Thailand's pioneering developer who revolutionized Thai life by introducing ice and establishing Bangkok's first five-star hotel, continues under the visionary leadership of his great-granddaughter, Naphaporn Bodiratnangkura. Her decision to open the family's cherished century-old sanctuary for this unprecedented collaboration speaks to both courage and vision.

Aman, drawing its name from the Sanskrit word for peace, has spent over three decades becoming the world's most intuitive luxury resort and residence brand since Amanpuri's 1988 founding in Phuket. Known for ultra-premium service, high-profile clientele, and the world's most exotic locations, Aman has transformed the definition of luxury living through properties that prioritize space, privacy, and a peerless home-away-from-home experience. Together, these two forces have created not simply residences, but a new chapter in Bangkok's architectural and cultural narrative, one where heritage preservation meets forward-thinking design, and where the peace of a century-old jungle sanctuary elevates urban living to an art form.

Where Mediterranean luxury meets sustainable living on Crete's most privileged coastline. A 138-acre luxury resort combining 1 Hotels' first European property with 257 branded residences. Overlooking Mirabello Bay in Elounda, the jewel of Crete's northeast coast 1 Hotels & Homes ELOUNDA HILLS Crete, Greece 1hotels-elounda 2026-01-01 Elounda Hills: Contemporary Mediterranean Island Living in Crete's Premier Luxury Resort Destination Developed by Mirum Group in collaboration with nature-inspired lifestyle hotel brand 1 Hotels, Elounda Hills represents a new pinnacle of Mediterranean luxury on the island's northeast coast. This exceptional 138-acre resort features a 129-key hotel with Bamford Spa, alongside 257 residences thoughtfully designed to blend authentic Cretan aesthetics with state-of-the-art biophilic principles. The project has achieved 'Strategic Investment Status' with the Greek Government and is designated a "Special Zoning Plan" ratified by Presidential Decree.

Set within a natural amphitheatre overlooking the sparkling waters of Mirabello Bay, Elounda Hills offers an extraordinary community where contemporary design harmonizes with the rugged Cretan landscape. The exclusive Waterfront Villas feature stunning interiors by Ralph Lauren Home, while Camper & Nicholsons will manage the boutique marina scheduled for 2028. With over 300 days of sunshine annually, residents enjoy year-round access to two private beach clubs, nine dining venues, extensive wellness facilities, and a vibrant Piazza modeled after traditional Mediterranean town squares. This is where cosmopolitan sophistication meets the timeless spirit of Greece's legendary island. A Timeless Expression of Barefoot Luxury Inspired by Crete's Legendary Landscape Inspired by the genius loci of this distinctive site, Elounda Hills embodies a sublime duality: the monumentality of nature meeting the intimacy of Mediterranean living. Award-winning European architects have created a vision where residences don't dominate the landscape but dissolve into it, with layered terraces cascading down hillsides and infinity pools reflecting endless Aegean horizons. Every architectural gesture pays homage to traditional Cretan craftsmanship while embracing cutting-edge sustainable design, creating spaces that breathe with the rhythm of the natural world.

This is architecture as poetry, where floor-to-ceiling windows frame the sea like living canvases, where native stone and reclaimed materials ground each residence in its ancient setting, and where biophilic design principles ensure a constant, nurturing connection between inhabitants and their environment. The vision extends beyond individual homes to encompass an entire resort ecosystem: olive and carob tree canopies sheltering wellness sanctuaries, botanical gardens flowing into infinity, and a marina welcoming explorers to discover Greece's 6,000 islands. At Elounda Hills, the dream is not merely luxury, but longevity, creating a community that will endure for generations, shaped by nature's wisdom and human aspiration. Greece's Most Ambitious Luxury Resort: 138 Acres of Contemporary Mediterranean Excellence Location: Elounda, northeast Crete, overlooking Mirabello Bay
Total Development: 138-acre resort with Strategic Investment Status
Residences: 257 branded homes, including Hilltop Residences, Terrace Villas, Mirabello Villas, Marina Collection, and exclusive Waterfront Villas
Price Range: From €872,000 to €6,127,000+
Hotel: 129-key 1 Hotels property with 2,000 sq m Bamford Spa
Design Partners: 1 Hotels & Homes, Ralph Lauren Home (Waterfront Villas), award-winning European architects
Marina: Boutique marina managed by Camper & Nicholsons, accommodating yachts up to 90 meters
Amenities: Two private beach clubs, nine restaurants, tennis and padel courts, amphitheatre, kids and teens clubs
Sustainability: Carbon-neutral operations, BREEAM and LEED certified, biophilic design principles
Golden Visa Eligibility: Qualifying investment for Greek residency-by-investment program (€800,000 minimum) An Unrivalled Mediterranean Lifestyle: Where Every Day Offers Endless Possibilities From pristine beach clubs to world-class dining, championship sports facilities to holistic wellness. Experience resort living redefined by 1 Hotels' pioneering approach to sustainable luxury. At Elounda Hills, exceptional services and leisure facilities create a lifestyle unmatched anywhere in Crete. Residents celebrate sun and sand at two exclusive private beach clubs with soft white sand and sheltered waters, where expertly mixed cocktails and musical entertainment enhance long Mediterranean afternoons. Culinary excellence defines the experience, with dozens of exceptional tavernas and fine-dining restaurants showcasing Cretan cuisine's emphasis on fresh, locally-sourced ingredients, vibrant vegetables, aromatic herbs, and exceptional olive oil. The 2,000 square meter Bamford Spa at 1 Hotel offers a holistic wellness sanctuary beneath canopies of olive, tamarisk, and carob trees, featuring steam rooms, saunas, a wellness pool, and carefully curated treatments centered around nature connection. 

Active pursuits abound with tennis and padel courts, HIIT training, boxing, yoga flow sessions, and water sports, while the boutique marina managed by Camper & Nicholsons provides seamless access to Greece's premier sailing destinations. The vibrant Piazza, modeled after traditional Mediterranean town squares, offers convenient village amenities including a mini-market, delicatessen, pharmacy, gelateria, chapel, business lounge, and dedicated medical center, ensuring effortless living within this extraordinary community. Perfectly Positioned: Where Ancient History Meets Modern Connectivity The eastern region of Lasithi exemplifies understated, upmarket tourism, with Elounda serving as Crete's destination of choice for sophisticated travelers. Blessed with 300 days of annual sunshine and a stunning 1,000-kilometer coastline, this legendary island, birthplace of the Minoan civilization, offers unparalleled access to pristine beaches, secluded coves, mountain ranges, and Europe's major capitals.

Heraklion International Airport – 45 45-minute drive, connecting to all major European cities
Kastelli International Airport – Opening 2027, 30 minutes drive, expected to become Greece's second busiest airport with private jet facilities
Agios Nikolaos – 20 minutes, a charming coastal town with top hotels, restaurants, boutiques, and a major hospital
Elounda Village – 10 minutes, picturesque waterfront village with tavernas and local craftsmanship
Spinalonga Island – 15 minutes by boat, historic Venetian fortress and former leper colony
Minoan Knossos Palace – 60 minutes, Europe's oldest city and cradle of Western civilization
Mount Oxia Ruins – 6.4km hiking trail offering spectacular panoramic views
European Capitals – London 2 hours, Paris 3 hours, Berlin 3 hours, Rome 4 hours by direct flight Mirum Group: Two Decades of Excellence in Mediterranean Luxury Real Estate Mirum Group Mirum Group has established itself as one of the Mediterranean's most respected luxury developers, delivering over 600 residences across the past two decades, including a luxury boutique hotel concept and a beachfront estate of private villas in Crete, one of which set the record for the most expensive property ever sold on the island. As both investor and developer, Mirum Hellas maintains control over the entire development cycle, from initial design and government approvals through construction, realization, and sales, supported by a carefully curated team of world-leading partners and contractors. 

This integrated approach ensures uncompromising quality standards and seamless execution of the company's visionary projects. The Elounda Hills development represents Mirum's most ambitious undertaking to date, having achieved 'Strategic Investment Status' with the Greek Government and designation as a "Special Zoning Plan" ratified by Presidential Decree. This recognition reflects both the project's scale and its alignment with Greece's strategic economic development goals, positioning Elounda Hills as a landmark destination that will define luxury Mediterranean living for generations to come.

Where Canada's wilderness meets Ritz-Carlton legacy on a private island sanctuary. An exclusive community of 32 estate homes on Lake of Bays, where morning mist over pristine waters and centuries-old forests create memories for generations. Ritz Carlton The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Muskoka Whiskey Bay, Canada ritz-carlton-muskoka The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Muskoka: Canada's Premier Private Island Estate Community Nestled on a 140-acre private island in the heart of Lake of Bays, The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Muskoka represents one of the final opportunities to claim pristine, undeveloped waterfront land in Canada's most coveted lakeside region. This extraordinary enclave of just thirty-two custom estate homes honors Muskoka's century-old cottage tradition while elevating it to unprecedented heights of sophistication and service.

Each residence is a meticulous interpretation of the traditional Canadian cabin, a harmonious blend of rustic authenticity and refined luxury. Designed by acclaimed Studio CABAN and appointed by Copenhagen's Norm Architects, these multi-acre estates feature expansive main residences, private boathouses, optional guest bunkies, and between 303 and 1,650 feet of coveted waterfront. With 40 acres preserved as conservation land and dedicated fish conservation waters, residents live in profound harmony with nature while enjoying legendary Ritz-Carlton service, arriving by private boat to a world where every detail is seamlessly managed. A Legacy Written in Water, Stone, and Sky; Where Time Moves Differently Imagine mornings where sunlight dances across your private dock, where the only sound is pine needles sighing in the breeze and loons calling across mirror-still waters. This is not a vacation home. This is where your family's story unfolds across generations, where children learn to paddle in protected coves, where friendships deepen around lakeside fires beneath canopies of stars, where the changing seasons become the rhythm of life itself.

Studio CABAN's architectural vision places each residence gently upon the land, following natural contours to maximize sun exposure and lake views while preserving absolute privacy. Stone and timber sourced from Canadian forests create structures that feel both ancient and contemporary, as if they've always belonged here. Inside, Norm Architects' Scandinavian sensibility brings warmth through natural materials, cathedral ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows that dissolve the boundary between shelter and wilderness. This is luxury that whispers rather than shouts, where every detail serves the soul's deep need for beauty, tranquility, and authentic connection to the natural world. Thirty-Two Estates. One Hundred Forty Acres. An Eternity of Memories. Total Residences: 32 custom estate homes on a private island
Lot Sizes: 1.98 to 5.12 acres with 303 to 1,650 feet of waterfront
Conservation Commitment: 40 acres of protected wilderness, dedicated fish conservation waters
Architecture: Studio CABAN (Tucson), renowned for Four Seasons, One&Only, Six Senses
Interior Design: Norm Architects (Copenhagen), masters of Scandinavian minimalism
Residence Components: Main cottage (up to 7 bedrooms), optional 1-2 bedroom guest bunkies, signature boathouse, private dock
Property Features: Cathedral ceilings, stone fireplaces, chef's kitchens, primary suites with lake views
Access: Private boat transfer from mainland residence club (minutes from property)
Natural Features: Coniferous and deciduous forests, 134 native plant species, 28 breeding bird species
Trail Network: 15 miles of private hiking trails connecting island residences and viewpoints The Mainland Club: Where Wellness, Culture, and Connection Elevate Island Living Beyond your private island retreat awaits a world-class residence club, your gateway to curated experiences, social connection, and legendary Ritz-Carlton service. From the moment you arrive at the mainland residence club, every detail unfolds with effortless grace. Your vehicle is valet-parked while a dedicated concierge orchestrates your seamless transition to island life. A private captain whisks you across pristine waters to your estate—just minutes away but worlds apart. This is the art of arriving home.

The mainland club reimagines luxury amenities for the modern estate owner. A fully equipped fitness studio with sauna, steam room, hot tub, and cold plunge overlooks forest vistas. Tennis, pickleball, and basketball courts nestle discreetly among the trees, while a pro golf simulator satisfies year-round precision practice. The spa offers massage, facials, and wellness therapies. Yoga and Pilates sessions unfold on dedicated decks. For social moments, the owners' lounge and cocktail bar create intimate gatherings, while the signature lakeside restaurant delivers exceptional dining. 

The outdoor pool and great lawn provide leisure spaces for families. A cinema-style media lounge, games room with billiards, curated library, wine tasting lounge with private cellar storage, and private event pavilion complete the experience. Overflow guest suites ensure visiting friends and family enjoy Ritz-Carlton comfort. Services extend to your island home—from pre-arrival provisioning and housekeeping to seasonal preparation and secure mail delivery, allowing you to simply live. Lake of Bays & Beyond: A World-Class Location Connected to the Globe Muskoka Airport – Private aviation hub, 40 minutes
Toronto Pearson International – 176 cities across 61 countries, 2 hours
Downtown Toronto – Canada's financial and cultural capital
Bigwin Island Golf Club – 15 minutes by boat

Algonquin Provincial Park – Pristine wilderness for canoeing and hiking, 45 minutes Density Group Limited: Visionaries Building Legacy, One Exceptional Project at a Time Density Group Density Group is a privately held real estate firm based in Toronto, distinguished by its unwavering commitment to transforming ambitious visions into enduring realities. With a robust portfolio spanning land development across Canada, the United States, and Europe, Density Group operates through both private equity partnerships and strategic debt placement, bringing sophisticated financial acumen to every venture. The firm's reputation rests on three pillars: consistent on-time delivery, a design-driven philosophy that prioritizes beauty and functionality, and the lasting trust of its investors and partners. Where other developers chase trends, Density Group creates timeless places that honor their natural settings while anticipating the needs of discerning residents. The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Muskoka represents the firm's signature legacy project, a once-in-a-generation opportunity to steward one of Canada's last pristine private islands, creating an enclave that will be treasured for centuries to come.

Discover Exceptional Waterfront Living Where Thai Elegance Meets Arabian Splendour Experience the ultimate fusion of luxury hospitality and residential sophistication in Ras Al Khaimah's most coveted waterfront destination. Anantara Anantara Mina Residences Ras Al Khaimah, UAE anantara-khaimah 2028-01-01 Anantara Mina Residences - Where Cascading Architecture Frames Boundless Gulf Views Nestled on the pristine shores of Hayat Island within the exclusive Mina peninsula, Anantara Mina Residences represents a groundbreaking collaboration between renowned hospitality brand Anantara and RAK Properties. This exceptional collection of branded residences seamlessly blends Thai-inspired luxury with Arabian heritage, creating a unique waterfront sanctuary just 45 minutes from Dubai.

The development showcases a masterful blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance, where cascading architectural forms embrace the coastline and maximize natural light. Each residence, from sophisticated apartments to expansive waterfront villas, offers unparalleled access to five-star amenities, personalized services, and the crystalline waters of the Arabian Gulf. Visionary Design Inspired by Sea's Fluidity and Nature's Perfect Harmony Drawing inspiration from the fluidity of the sea, Anantara Mina Residences features cascading architectural forms that embrace the coastline with graceful tiers unfolding at every level. The visionary design maximizes natural light while framing panoramic seascapes through floor-to-ceiling windows and expansive terraces. Thai refinement harmoniously blends with Arabian heritage, guided by contemporary nautical influences that create homes resonating with their coastal environment.

Clean lines and artisanal finishes reflect the surrounding landscape, while natural materials sourced from the environment ensure perfect harmony between land and water. From private villas with mirror-like infinity pools to sea-facing apartments bathed in golden light, each residence delivers exclusive living designed around nature's perfect inspiration, where light and sea become essential elements of everyday splendour. Premium Collection Features 84 Branded Residences with Private Boat Access Total Units: 84 branded residences with Anantara hospitality services
Unit Types: Suites, 1-bed, 2-bed, 2-bed + maid, 3-bed sky villas 
Villa Options: 3, 4, and 5-bedroom waterfront with private pools
Unique Features: Individual boat docks and direct Gulf access
Interior Design: Thai and Arabian motifs with nautical elegance
Payment Plan: Flexible 60/40 structure available
Pricing: Villas starting at AED 12.85 million (USD 3.5 million)
Developer: RAK Properties in partnership with Minor Hotels
Architecture: JT+Partners with cascading coastal design
Location: Hayat Island, Mina Peninsula, Ras Al Khaimah Five-Star Amenities Create an Unparalleled Resort Lifestyle Experience Exclusive access to world-class facilities and personalized Anantara hospitality services, bringing authentic luxury into everyday residential living Experience resort-style living with dedicated concierge services, multiple dining venues, and exclusive wellness facilities. Residents enjoy unlimited access to sunrise and infinity pools, state-of-the-art fitness center and yoga studio, indoor and outdoor kids' clubs, plus a private cinema for intimate entertainment. The development features gourmet restaurants, café facilities, and comprehensive personal services including housekeeping, childcare arrangements, and in-room dining.

Additional premium amenities include electric buggy service for seamless island transport, event spaces for special occasions, and exclusive access to Anantara Spa treatments. Residents automatically receive Minor Discovery Titanium status, providing exceptional benefits including guaranteed hotel availability, complimentary breakfast, room upgrades, and 7% back in Discovery dollars across the global Anantara network of luxury hotels and resorts. Prime Mina Peninsula Location with Unmatched Connectivity and Natural Beauty Ras Al Khaimah International Airport - 15 minutes
Sharjah International Airport - 30 minutes
Dubai International Airport - 45 minutes

Jebel Jais Mountains - UAE's highest peak

Protected Mangroves - natural conservation areas RAK Properties - Two Decades of Excellence Creating Tomorrow's Communities RAK Properties RAK Properties stands as the UAE's leading real estate developer, committed to producing exceptional and sustainable destinations for over twenty years. Specializing in contemporary and meticulously crafted communities, the company integrates excellence, innovation, and nature to create enriching lifestyles aligned with future aspirations. As a pivotal force in achieving RAK Vision 2030, RAK Properties focuses on delivering economic, social, and environmental value while enhancing lives and contributing to Ras Al Khaimah's growing narrative as a premier destination for luxury living and investment opportunities.

Where refined elegance meets the pristine shores of the Arabian Gulf. Experience unparalleled sophistication at Waldorf Astoria Residences Ras Al Khaimah, where palatial living transcends ordinary luxury in an iconic destination. Waldorf Astoria Waldorf Astoria Residences Ras Al Khaimah Ras Al Khaimah, UAE waldorf-astoria-khaimah 2013-01-01 Waldorf Astoria Residences Ras Al Khaimah - Arabia's Crown Jewel of Sophisticated Beachfront Living Nestled like a precious gem along the pristine coastline of Ras Al Khaimah, Waldorf Astoria Residences represents the pinnacle of luxury living in the Arabian Peninsula. This extraordinary development seamlessly weaves together the timeless elegance of the iconic Waldorf Astoria brand with the authentic charm of Arabian hospitality, creating an unparalleled residential sanctuary where sophistication meets serenity.

Set against the majestic backdrop of the Hajar Mountains and offering unobstructed views of the crystal-clear Arabian Gulf and Al Marjan Island, these exclusive residences redefine the concept of refined living. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to ensure an extraordinary lifestyle experience, from the Art Deco-inspired interiors to the world-class amenities that epitomize the legendary Waldorf Astoria standard of excellence. Here, residents don't simply live—they ascend to a realm where every moment is infused with elegance, every vista tells a story, and every experience becomes a cherished memory in this captivating haven of luxury. A Modern Expression of Timeless Elegance Where Arabian Heritage Meets Contemporary Sophistication Imagine a sanctuary where architectural poetry meets the endless horizon of the Arabian Gulf—a place where every sunrise paints your private terrace in golden hues, and every sunset becomes a masterpiece framed by floor-to-ceiling windows. The vision for Waldorf Astoria Residences transcends conventional luxury, creating a living artwork that draws inspiration from the grandeur of Arabian Peninsula palaces while embracing the sophisticated elegance that defines the Waldorf Astoria legacy.

This ethereal haven has been conceived as more than a residence; it's a testament to refined living where meticulously landscaped pathways lead to private sanctuaries adorned with custom marble finishes and state-of-the-art smart systems. The architectural narrative celebrates the seamless fusion of tradition and modernity, where ancient Bedouin inscriptions meet cutting-edge design, and where the rhythm of ocean waves harmonizes with the pulse of contemporary life. Each residence becomes a canvas for sophisticated living, thoughtfully curated to offer not just a home, but an extraordinary lifestyle experience that embodies the essence of refined elegance and timeless sophistication. Exclusive Collection Featuring the Famed Starlight Terrace Concept from Waldorf Astoria New York Meticulously finished 2, 3, 4, and 5-bedroom residences with Gulf views
Floor-to-ceiling windows and private terraces
Custom Art Deco-inspired interiors with smart home technology
Exclusive 16th-floor Coastal Vista Lounge
Private resident amenities including wine cellar, cigar lounge, and cinema room
State-of-the-art fitness center with cryochambers and IV treatments
Dedicated concierge service and Personal PRO services for residents
Pet-friendly facilities with a dedicated grooming spa
Direct access to Waldorf Astoria resort amenities and lounges
Prime beachfront location Sincerely Elegant Service: Where Every Detail Elevates Your Everyday A symphony of exclusive amenities and personalized services designed to exceed the expectations of the most discerning residents. From the moment you step through the doors, a world of unparalleled luxury and convenience unfolds before you. The exclusive resident amenities at Waldorf Astoria Residences create a lifestyle ecosystem where sophistication meets functionality at every turn. The crown jewel, the 16th-floor Coastal Vista Lounge, presents breathtaking ocean vistas through its main lounge, meeting room, and the legendary Starlight Terrace, recreating the magic of the famed WA Towers experience under the starlit Arabian sky. Residents indulge in a private wine cellar with personal lockers, an intimate cigar lounge for refined relaxation, and a state-of-the-art cinema room for exclusive screenings. The cutting-edge fitness center pairs with a revolutionary longevity spa featuring advanced wellness treatments, while the sports simulation room offers virtual experiences on world-renowned golf courses and stadiums. Beyond these exclusive spaces, residents enjoy seamless access to the resort's nine meticulously curated restaurants and lounges, world-class spa treatments, multiple swimming pools, and championship amenities, all supported by dedicated concierge services and Personal PRO assistance that transforms daily living into an effortless expression of luxury. Perfectly Positioned in Ras Al Khaimah's Premier Lifestyle Destination Al Hamra Golf Club - Championship 18-hole course designed by Peter Harradine, on-site
Royal Yacht Club of Ras Al Khaimah - walking distance
Al Marjan Island - future home to Wynn Resort, 5 minutes
Manar Mall - 10 minutes
Ras Al Khaimah International Airport - 15 minutes
Jebel Jais Mountain - 45 minutes
Dubai International Airport - 60 minutes
Dubai Marina - 50 minutes
Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi - Iconic luxury landmark, 90 minutes Al Hamra: Visionary Architects of Ras Al Khaimah's Luxury Landscape Al Hamra Al Hamra stands as a distinguished lifestyle development and investment company that has fundamentally shaped Ras Al Khaimah's transformation into the UAE's premier luxury destination. Established in 2003 and recognized among the top-50 GCC developers by Construction Week Middle East in 2022, Al Hamra has cultivated an impressive portfolio that encompasses residential excellence, hospitality innovation, and lifestyle experiences. The group's visionary approach extends across renowned properties, including Al Hamra Village, the championship Al Hamra Golf Club, and the prestigious Royal Yacht Club of Ras Al Khaimah, while its hospitality portfolio features iconic properties such as Waldorf Astoria Ras Al Khaimah, The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah Al Hamra Beach, and the forthcoming Sofitel Ras Al Khaimah Beach Resort. With an ambitious five-year roadmap aligned with Ras Al Khaimah's Vision 2030, Al Hamra continues to set new benchmarks in luxury living through strategic global partnerships and an unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional value for customers, visitors, and investors. Their groundbreaking projects, including the revolutionary Falcon Island development, demonstrate Al Hamra's dedication to creating destinations that transcend ordinary luxury to become extraordinary lifestyle experiences.

The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Al Wadi Desert: Own a Piece of the Legend in the Heart of Arabia's Most Pristine Desert Sanctuary. Where endless golden dunes meet legendary Ritz-Carlton service in an exclusive collection of just 35 private desert villas. Ritz Carlton The Ritz-Carlton Residneces Ras Al Khamiah, Al Wadi Desert Ras Al Khaimah, UAE ritz-carlton-khaimah 2027-12-01 The Ritz-Carlton Residences, Al Wadi Desert – Ultra-Luxury Desert Villas in Protected Nature Reserve Nestled within the 1,235-acre Al Wadi Nature Reserve in Ras Al Khaimah, The Ritz-Carlton Residences represent an unprecedented fusion of Arabian heritage and contemporary luxury. These exclusive desert villas offer a world away from everyday life, where residents can witness the mesmerizing beauty of pristine desert landscapes while enjoying the legendary service standards of The Ritz-Carlton brand. Each residence is meticulously designed to blur the boundaries between indoor luxury and the raw magnificence of the surrounding desert environment.

Set against the dramatic backdrop of the Hajar Mountains and just 45 minutes from Dubai, this intimate collection of 35 villas provides seamless access to breathtaking desert vistas and long-standing Bedouin traditions. The development embodies the perfect harmony between modern amenities and traditional Arab hospitality, creating a one-of-a-kind residential experience that celebrates the authentic spirit of the Emirates while delivering uncompromising luxury. Where Desert Dreams Take Form – An Architectural Symphony of Sand and Sophistication The architectural vision for The Ritz-Carlton Residences transforms the ethereal beauty of the desert into a living, breathing residential masterpiece. Each villa is designed as a window into an alluring atmosphere, where the seamless integration amplifies the natural elements of the wadi – the sights, sounds, and scents of the desert creating a visceral connection between residents and their extraordinary surroundings. Earthy tones and delicate textures wrap each villa, creating perfect harmony with the undulating desert landscape.

This is not merely a collection of homes; it's a poetic interpretation of desert living where iconic landscapes meet understated yet upscale architecture. The design philosophy centers on enhancing the connection to nature through luxuriously appointed interiors that seamlessly blend with the surrounding context. Every element has been carefully curated to create an immersive and enchanting experience, where the concept of bringing the outdoors inside reaches its ultimate expression through an inspired interplay of form, matter, and the timeless beauty of the Arabian desert. 35 Exclusive Villas Within Arabia's Last Protected Desert Sanctuary – Starting AED 15.6M Location: 1,235-acre Al Wadi Nature Reserve, Ras Al Khaimah
Total Units: 35 exclusive villas
Villa Sizes: 527m² to 775m² total area
Pricing: From AED 15.6M to AED 21.1M ($4.24M - $5.74M)
Delivery: Q1 2027
Developer: RAK Properties / RAK Hospitality Holding
Interior Design: H+A Design Studio, Dubai
Unique Features: Private pools, desert terraces & direct resort access
Distance: 45 minutes from Dubai Beyond Luxury – A Complete Desert Lifestyle Ecosystem World-class facilities designed to complement the desert sanctuary experience with exclusive access to The Ritz-Carlton Al Wadi Desert Resort. Exclusive Residents' Clubhouse & Premier Resort Amenities at BelAir The Residents' Clubhouse stands as the crown jewel of community amenities, offering an extravagant mix of entertainment, wellness, and business facilities within a 500m² sophisticated space. This cherry-on-the-top experience includes a fully equipped gym, dedicated yoga studio, private cinema, curated library, comprehensive business center, and professional boardrooms – all designed to cater to residents' social and business needs in the most refined manner.

Beyond the clubhouse, residents enjoy seamless access to the adjacent Ritz-Carlton resort's world-class amenities, including the renowned spa sanctuary, championship-level recreational facilities, and multiple fine dining venues that celebrate both international cuisine and authentic local flavors. The development features meticulously planned buggy paths connecting all villas to central amenities, valet services, and dedicated parking areas. Each villa boasts private terraces with individual pools, offering residents the ultimate in privacy while maintaining connection to the broader resort lifestyle. The combination of exclusive residential amenities and resort access creates an unparalleled living experience that redefines luxury desert living. Strategic Desert Positioning – Where Pristine Wilderness Meets Urban Accessibility The Ritz-Carlton Al Wadi Desert Resort – Adjacent property
Dubai International Airport – 45 minutes

Traditional Souks – 30 minutes
Private Beach Access – 35 minutes
Dubai Marina – 50 minutes RAK Properties – Pioneering Luxury Development in the Northern Emirates RAK Properties RAK Properties, operating under RAK Hospitality Holding, stands as the northern emirates' most prestigious luxury developer, with an exceptional portfolio spanning hospitality, residential, and mixed-use developments throughout Ras Al Khaimah. With deep roots in the emirate and an intimate understanding of its unique cultural heritage and natural assets, the company has established itself as the definitive authority on creating authentic luxury experiences that celebrate local traditions while meeting international standards. Their collaboration with The Ritz-Carlton brand represents the culmination of years of expertise in luxury hospitality development, bringing together world-class service standards with genuine Emirati hospitality. The partnership with H+A Design Studio, a boutique Dubai-based firm specializing in wellness-focused, culturally sensitive architecture, ensures that every aspect of The Ritz-Carlton Residences reflects both global luxury standards and authentic regional character, creating a development that truly belongs to its extraordinary desert setting.

Project name: The Residences at Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel, Bangkok
Project description:
kempinski-bangkok Kempinski, Bangkok With most residences forming part of our stunning hotels and resorts, you'll have access to indulgent amenities that elevate everyday living to extraordinary heights. Each carefully curated facility reflects Kempinski's commitment to excellence and attention to detail.

Amenities include:
Private Swimming Pools
Rejuvenating Spa Facilities
State-of-the-Art Fitness Centers
Landscaped Gardens
Gourmet Restaurants
Private Residence Lounge
24/7 Concierge Services
Retail Outlets
Private Terraces & Balconies
Professional Property Management

Experience unparalleled luxury living in the heart of Bangkok's most prestigious address. Where legendary Kempinski hospitality meets exclusive residential excellence in the vibrant pulse of Thailand's capital city Kempinski The Residences at Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel, Bangkok Bangkok, TH kempinski-bangkok 2021-01-01 The Residences at Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel Bangkok - Ultra-luxury serviced residences redefining metropolitan living. Nestled in the prestigious Lumpini district, The Residences at Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel Bangkok represents the pinnacle of sophisticated urban living. This extraordinary development seamlessly blends the legendary hospitality standards of Kempinski Hotels with the privacy and comfort of exclusive residential living, creating an unprecedented lifestyle experience in one of Asia's most dynamic capitals.

Rising majestically above Bangkok's skyline, these meticulously crafted residences offer discerning residents an oasis of tranquility amidst the city's vibrant energy. Each residence is thoughtfully designed to capture panoramic views of Lumpini Park and the sprawling metropolis beyond, while providing immediate access to world-class amenities, fine dining, and the personalized service that has made Kempinski a symbol of luxury for over a century. Where timeless European elegance embraces contemporary Bangkok sophistication The architectural vision behind The Residences at Sindhorn Kempinski Hotel Bangkok transcends conventional luxury living, creating a harmonious dialogue between classical European refinement and modern Asian design sensibilities. Each residence becomes a private sanctuary where floor-to-ceiling windows frame ever-changing cityscapes, while carefully curated interiors reflect the perfect balance of comfort and grandeur.

This is more than a residential address – it's a lifestyle philosophy that celebrates the art of gracious living. From the moment residents enter their private elevator lobby to the personalized concierge services available around the clock, every detail has been orchestrated to create an environment where luxury becomes effortless, where sophisticated amenities enhance daily life, and where the boundaries between home and world-class hospitality dissolve into one seamless experience of uncompromising excellence. Exclusive collection of 51 ultra-luxury residences with dedicated Kempinski service 51 exclusive residences
Prime Lumpini location
Full-service luxury hotel amenities
24/7 concierge services
Private elevator access
Panoramic city and park views

Inspired by Phuket's reputation as the Pearl of the Andaman Sea and the Thai word "Weylaa" (Time), this exclusive development invites residents to celebrate life's precious moments as time ebbs and flows at their own pace. Spanning 6,400 sqm of meticulously designed landscape, Peylaa offers a unique blend of urban sophistication and tropical serenity, featuring three elegant 7-story condominium buildings that house 408 thoughtfully crafted units.

Located just moments from Bang Tao Beach and surrounded by world-class amenities, international schools, and premium shopping destinations, Peylaa represents the perfect balance between tranquil retreat and dynamic lifestyle. Each unit is designed to maximize privacy, natural light, and stunning views of pools, internal courtyards, and surrounding mountains. This is where discerning residents can escape the ordinary and embrace a complete lifestyle destination that delivers the finest in contemporary tropical living while maintaining the privacy and exclusivity that defines true luxury. A Timeless Sanctuary Where Coastal Elegance Meets Tropical Sophistication At Peylaa Phuket Bang Tao, our vision transcends traditional condominium living to create an ethereal sanctuary where time becomes your most precious luxury. Drawing inspiration from the gentle rhythm of Phuket's coastal waters and the island's reputation as the Pearl of the Andaman Sea, we have crafted a residential masterpiece that captures the essence of tropical elegance while offering the sophistication of contemporary design. Our architectural vision centers on the creation of a private urban retreat that feels worlds away from the bustling energy of everyday life, yet remains perfectly connected to everything that makes Phuket extraordinary.

The serene internal courtyard, spanning over 4 rai, serves as the heart of the community - a tranquil oasis where residents can find respite, reflection, and renewal amidst lush tropical landscapes and sparkling waters. Every element of Peylaa has been designed to awaken the senses and captivate the spirit, from the timeless wood-tone exterior facades that blend seamlessly with the natural environment to the floor-to-ceiling windows that frame the island's breathtaking vistas. This is a place where architectural poetry meets practical luxury, where residents experience a world of wonder where each day unfolds like a carefully composed symphony of comfort, beauty, and serenity. Our comprehensive approach to community living ensures that, whether you're pursuing an active lifestyle, balancing work and family commitments, or thriving as a remote professional, every facility has been designed with meticulous attention to quality and real-world functionality. The heart of our active lifestyle amenities centers around three pristine 25-meter swimming pools, complemented by a fully equipped gymnasium, boxing ring, dedicated studios for Pilates and yoga, plus specialized outdoor fitness areas and a full-size rooftop tennis court.

Our community spaces recognize the evolving needs of modern living, featuring sophisticated co-working environments with large meeting rooms and private silent booths for focused work, alongside a lobby conference room and well-appointed library. Families can enjoy the dedicated kids' club, playground, and barbecue areas with comfortable outdoor seating, while sunken seating spaces and a luxurious jacuzzi pool create intimate areas for relaxation and social connection. Understanding that luxury extends beyond physical amenities, our resident services include professional rental management for investment returns, convenient shuttle services, and a welcoming lobby lounge that sets the tone for the exceptional lifestyle experience within this coastal sanctuary. ELLE Resort & Beach Club – A Landmark of Luxury, Lifestyle, and Investment in Seminyak, Bali. A first-of-its-kind collaboration bringing together the global prestige of ELLE, the operational expertise of Cross Hotels & Resorts, and the visionary development of Geonet to create Bali’s most exciting branded lifestyle destination. ELLE ELLE Resort & Beach Club Bali, Indonesia elle-bali 2027-01-01 An iconic beachfront development that unites international design, world-class hospitality, and a high-performing investment model, setting a new benchmark for branded resorts in Bali and the Asia-Pacific region. ELLE Resort & Beach Club is a luxury resort, branded hotel, and beach club located on Bali’s prime Seminyak beachfront. It combines a globally recognised fashion and lifestyle brand with high-end hospitality to deliver an experience unmatched in the region.

The project is a collaboration between Geonet Properties & Geonet Developments International, Colliers International (independent project management), Cross Hotels & Resorts (operator, part of Flight Centre Travel Group), Inspiral (architect), and ELLE (global brand licensing). Together, these partners bring decades of expertise in real estate development, hospitality operations, and international brand curation.

The resort features 170 keys across a curated mix of Standard Rooms, Suites, Lofts, and Penthouses, anchored by the flagship ELLE Beach Club. Designed by Inspiral, the architecture blends contemporary forms with natural Balinese influences to create a sense of elegance and authenticity. Beyond leisure, ELLE Resort & Beach Club is structured as a premium investment opportunity, offering a compliant, tax-efficient offshore SPV model with secure investment rights and attractive returns. ELLE Resort & Beach Club is designed to elevate Bali’s luxury hospitality market, blending global design, lifestyle culture, and sustainable investment into a singular long-term asset. The vision behind ELLE Resort & Beach Club is to create a world-class beachfront destination that embodies sophistication, creativity, and timeless design. By partnering with ELLE, one of the most recognisable lifestyle brands in the world, the project positions itself at the intersection of fashion, hospitality, and experiential travel.

The resort is conceived as more than just accommodation – it is a hub for culture, wellness, and entertainment. From its signature ELLE Beach Club to curated retail, dining, and lifestyle offerings, the development reflects a commitment to delivering memorable experiences for global travellers.

Architecturally, the property integrates modern elegance with natural aesthetics and Balinese heritage. Spacious layouts, refined interiors, and world-class amenities ensure comfort while maintaining a connection to the island’s natural beauty. Every detail, from design to operations, is aligned with sustainability and long-term value creation. For investors, the vision is equally powerful: to offer strong, predictable returns while owning part of an internationally branded landmark property in one of the world’s most sought-after destinations. An internationally branded beachfront resort with 170 luxury units, operated by Cross Hotels & Resorts and licensed under the iconic ELLE brand. Property Type: 170 units (Standard Rooms, Suites, Lofts, and Penthouses).
Location: Prime beachfront site in Seminyak Bali.
Returns: 8% p.a. during construction; 15% projected net operational returns (10-year average).
Operator: Cross Hotels & Resorts, part of Flight Centre Travel Group.
Project Manager: Colliers International.
Global Brand Partner: ELLE (Hachette Filipacchi Presse).
Architect: Inspiral.
Developer: Geonet Developments International.
Interior Design: High end fashion fusion with international luxury standards. Luxury amenities that define the ELLE lifestyle in the heart of Seminyak. From the signature beach club to curated dining, wellness, and private lounges, every amenity is designed for an elevated experience. A destination in itself, ELLE Resort & Beach Club offers far more than just a place to stay. At the heart of the resort is the flagship ELLE Beach Club – a beachfront icon designed for world-class entertainment, dining, and sunset gatherings that capture Bali’s vibrant spirit. This space will serve as a cultural and social hub, blending music, fashion, and lifestyle in an unrivalled beachfront setting.
 
The resort also features a carefully curated selection of restaurants, rooftop lounges, and private event venues, offering guests variety, exclusivity, and international dining standards. Whether it is a casual poolside lunch or a fine-dining evening experience, each concept reflects ELLE’s global lifestyle identity.
 
Wellness is integral. Guests enjoy a full-service spa, fitness centre, and full service holistic health facilities designed to restore balance and vitality. Families are catered for with dedicated children’s clubs and recreation spaces, while business travellers have access to premium meeting rooms and private event facilities.
 
Every amenity has been designed with the international guest in mind, combining Balinese warmth with ELLE’s modern aesthetic. This fusion makes the resort both a lifestyle destination and a reliable investment vehicle, ensuring global appeal and strong year-round demand. Located on Bali’s Golden Mile, the island’s most coveted beachfront position, with direct access to Seminyak and Canggu’s lifestyle hubs. Seminyak Beachfront – 0 minutes (on-site).
Finns Beach Club – 7 minutes. (2.7km)
Potato Head Beach Club – 7 minutes. (2.7km)
Seminyak Village – 10 minutes. (3.4km)
Ngurah Rai International Airport – 35 minutes. (13.8km)
Canggu (Berawa) – 10 minutes. (4.6km)
Ubud Cultural Centre – 1 hour. (29km)
Nusa Dua Luxury Resorts – 40 minutes. (21km) Geonet – Delivering High-Performing Investments with World-Class Partnerships. Geonet Geonet is an Australian owned group of companies and a Bali-based development and investment group specialising in luxury hospitality and high-yield real estate. With a proven track record across villas, resorts, and branded hotels, Geonet is recognised for combining investor-centric models with landmark projects.

For ELLE Resort & Beach Club, Geonet has assembled an ecosystem of best-in-class partners: ELLE as the global brand licensor, Cross Hotels & Resorts as operator, and Colliers International as independent project manager. This collaboration ensures the project is delivered to international standards, with strong governance, operational excellence, and compliance built into every stage.

Where Legacy Embraces Luxury, Champions Call Home. When football royalty meets Dubai's waterfront, every day becomes your perfect match. Experience the ultimate fusion of Chelsea F.C. heritage and resort-style living. Chelsea Chelsea Residences by Damac Dubai, UAE chelsea-dubai 2029-12-01 Chelsea Residences by DAMAC - Where Football Legends Meet Waterfront Luxury Excellence For the first time, the legendary Chelsea F.C.'s passion, prowess, and dedication to perfection materializes into tangible glory through DAMAC Properties. This groundbreaking partnership brings the club's illustrious heritage to life for contemporary aesthetes in Dubai Maritime City, creating what is set to be a journey of pure pride and luxury.

The six towers of Chelsea Residences by DAMAC are a contemporary, urban reflection of coral reefs, conceptualized to echo the lush vibrancy of underwater life and the very spirit of the eponymous football club. Each tower blurs the line between contemporary urban sophistication and indulgent waterfront resort-style living like never before.

Our innovative architectural approach reflects the unmistakable cool of Chelsea's hometown London, harmoniously balanced with Dubai's innovative nature to create a perfect equilibrium between serenity and energy. The towers stand as a distillation of Chelsea's very essence, their passion, pride, and purpose, brought to life in the most luxuriously timeless way possible.

Located as a hidden gem in Dubai Maritime City, residents enjoy exclusive access to their private beach while remaining just 23 minutes from Dubai International Airport and 22 minutes from Downtown Dubai. This is more than a neighbourhood, it's the embodiment of the city's vision, its rich past and vision for the future. An Aquatic Paradise Where Champions Experience Resort-Living as New Normal Where the ocean meets the sky and limitless ambition transforms into endless dreams, Chelsea Residences by DAMAC creates an aquatic wonderland that transcends traditional luxury living. This isn't merely about prestigious addresses; it's about experiencing what it means to live without compromise in an environment where every detail champions excellence.

The architectural vision draws inspiration from the natural, aquatic, and athletic worlds, creating towers that rise like magnificent coral formations from Dubai's pristine coastline. With windows offering unobstructed 270-degree views and biophilic design principles, each residence becomes a sanctuary where the boundary between indoor luxury and outdoor serenity dissolves seamlessly.

This ethereal concept transforms everyday living into an extraordinary experience where residents don't simply reside, they thrive in harmony with the ocean's rhythm. The development's crown jewel, a stunning coral reef aquascape, allows residents to swim in a colorful underwater paradise or soar on above-water swings, creating moments where depths inspire new heights of luxury living. Six Coral-Inspired Towers Featuring Dubai's First Residential Rooftop Football Pitch Six Distinctive Towers: Ranging from G+2P+25 to G+2P+33 floors with coral reef-inspired architecture
Premium Residences: One, two, and three-bedroom apartments with 270-degree unobstructed views
The Stamford Summit: Exclusive rooftop football pitch - Dubai's first residential development with this feature
Private Beach Access: Exclusive waterfront location in prestigious Dubai Maritime City
Strategic Location: 23 minutes to Dubai International Airport, 22 minutes to Downtown Dubai
Partnership Heritage: Official collaboration with globally renowned Chelsea F.C.
Resort-Style Living: Biophilic design principles with luxury hotel-standard amenities
Investment Opportunity: Waterfront property in a 100% tax-free environment with premium resale potential
Exclusive Coastline: Located on Dubai's limited remaining 7% undeveloped pristine coastline
World-Class Design: London sophistication meets Dubai innovation in architectural excellence Championship-Level Amenities Where Ocean Depths Inspire New Heights From football simulation rooms to coral reef aquascapes and rooftop pitches, every facility tells a story of excellence and innovation. The crown jewel of resort-style luxury living awaits at every turn. Chelsea Residences by DAMAC infuses the football club's championship spirit with an unwavering commitment to perfection, resulting in amenities designed to excite, indulge, and satiate every desire.

The development's most spectacular feature, the Pride of the Ocean coral reef, creates an immersive aquatic paradise where residents can swim in colorful underwater landscapes or glide on the above-water swing with wind in their hair. This vibrant aquascape represents the heart of the development's underwater-themed experience, complemented by the Chelsea Lion Beach and infinity sand pools.

Fitness enthusiasts will discover the Chelsea Football Simulation Room and Athlete Performance Training Centre, bringing professional-level training home. The crown achievement, The Stamford Summit rooftop pitch, offers residents their championship field in the sky. For comprehensive wellness, the Serenity Chelsea Athlete Spa features cryotherapy, rain therapy rooms, and the Starlit Wellness Centre, each space infused with rituals of sky, land, and sea.

Dining experiences rival the world's finest establishments with gourmet healthy fine dining restaurants, the Captain's Table, and a specialized monotrophic diet café promoting optimal wellness. Entertainment reaches new heights at the Stamford Cinema and Chelsea Powerhouse Lounge, while the Chelsea Sunset Bar provides the perfect setting to celebrate victories overlooking Dubai's spectacular coastline. Dubai Maritime City - Where Dubai's Heritage Meets Tomorrow's Vision Dubai International Airport: 23 minutes - seamless global connectivity 
Downtown Dubai/Burj Khalifa: 22 minutes - access to the heart of Dubai
J1 Beach: 14 minutes - pristine coastal recreation nearby
City Walk: 15 minutes - premier shopping and dining destination
Metro Access: 18 minutes - efficient public transportation links
Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club: Proximity - elite recreational facilities
DIFC Financial District: Easy access - international business hub
The World Islands: Nearby - exclusive island developments
Jumeirah Beach: Short drive - world-famous beach destination
Burj Al Arab: Convenient location - iconic luxury landmark access DAMAC Properties - Official Partner of Champions, Luxury by Appointment Damac DAMAC Properties stands as one of the Middle East's most prestigious luxury real estate developers, with over four decades of experience crafting exceptional living experiences across the region. As the official property development partner of the iconic, record-breaking, and globally renowned Chelsea F.C., DAMAC brings unparalleled expertise to this landmark project that represents a historic moment in luxury development.

This partnership marks the first time Chelsea F.C.'s championship heritage has been translated into residential luxury, combining DAMAC's commitment to innovation, quality, and architectural excellence with Chelsea's legendary dedication to perfection. The collaboration honors both Dubai's visionary future and London's sophisticated heritage, creating a development that sets new benchmarks for premium waterfront living.

With a distinguished portfolio spanning luxury residential developments, world-class hospitality projects, and innovative mixed-use communities, DAMAC Properties continues to redefine luxury living standards across the Middle East. Their expertise in waterfront developments, combined with a deep understanding of international luxury standards and commitment to delivering excellence, ensures that Chelsea Residences by DAMAC will establish new paradigms for championship-level living in Dubai Maritime City.
