Where wild elegance meets architectural poetry in Dubai's most coveted address. Experience the untamed beauty of Cavalli's signature style, sculpted into 95 exclusive residences that redefine luxury living between Dubai Water Canal and Safa Park. Cavalli Couture by Cavalli Dubai, UAE cavalli-business-bay 2025-12-01 Couture by Cavalli - Dubai's First Lagoon-Infused Luxury Tower with Wildlife-Inspired Opulence Couture by Cavalli emerges as a breathtaking fusion of Roberto Cavalli's wild aesthetic vision and Dubai's architectural ambition. This extraordinary 16-story tower represents more than luxury living; it's a manifesto of untamed elegance where wildlife patterns dance with architectural opulence in perfect harmony.

Positioned strategically between the flowing Dubai Water Canal and the verdant expanse of Safa Park, this exclusive development houses only 95 meticulously crafted residences, from sophisticated 3-bedroom apartments to magnificent 6-bedroom penthouses. Each unit tells a story of fluid design inspired by nature's graceful movement, incorporating Cavalli's signature wild animal prints and wildlife patterns into spaces that breathe luxury from every surface.

The development pioneered Dubai's first in-building lagoon concept, creating a swimmable oasis within the podium that stretches as the longest lagoon ever conceived within a residential tower. This aquatic centerpiece anchors a world of amenities that includes floating treatment rooms, private sky gardens for penthouses, and infinity pools that seem to merge with Dubai's endless skyline.

Every detail reflects Cavalli's commitment to exceptional craftsmanship, from the grandiose branded lobby adorned with wild pattern motifs to the private terraces that crown each penthouse. This is where fashion meets architecture, where the wild spirit of luxury finds its ultimate expression in one of Dubai's most prestigious addresses. Wild Sophistication Sculpted in Fluid Architecture - Nature's Movement Eternally Captured The architectural vision of Couture by Cavalli transcends conventional luxury, embodying Roberto Cavalli's ethereal interpretation of nature's untamed beauty. Like water flowing over sculptured stone, the building's fluid lines capture the graceful movement of wildlife in their natural habitat, translating this organic poetry into architectural form that seems to breathe with life itself.

Conceived as a living artwork, the tower rises with the inherent grace of a predator in motion, powerful yet elegant, wild yet refined. The facade flows like silk draped over muscle, its surfaces alive with the interplay of light and shadow that mimics the dappled patterns of sunlight filtering through a jungle canopy. This is architecture that doesn't merely house, it inspires, it moves, it captures the very essence of Cavalli's design philosophy.

Within this sculptural masterpiece, each residence becomes a private sanctuary where wild animal prints aren't merely decoration but integral elements of spatial poetry. The interior landscapes flow seamlessly from room to room, creating living spaces that pulse with the rhythm of nature while maintaining the sophisticated refinement that defines true luxury. This is where dreams take architectural form, where the boundaries between indoor and outdoor living dissolve into one continuous experience of elevated living. Dubai's First In-Building Lagoon: 95 Exclusive Residences with Private Infinity Pools Exclusive Collection: Limited to only 95 luxury residences across 16 floors
Unit Mix: 3BR, 4BR, 5BR residences and 6BR penthouses with private sky gardens
Unique Feature: Dubai's first and longest swimmable lagoon within a residential building
Private Amenities: Individual infinity pools and terrace gardens for every unit
Interior Design: Roberto Cavalli branded interiors with signature wildlife patterns
Premium Materials: Onyx turquoise flooring, Statuario marble, and bronze metal detailing
Location Advantage: Between Dubai Water Canal and Safa Park with panoramic views
Completion: 2025/2026 with flexible 60/40 payment plan
Developer: DAMAC Properties with Roberto Cavalli collaboration Dubai's First Floating Oasis: Where Lagoons Meet Sky Gardens in Unprecedented Luxury Experience the extraordinary convergence of water, wellness, and wild elegance across multiple levels of resort-style living amenities. Couture by Cavalli: Dubai’s Ultimate Aquatic Sanctuary and Sky-High Luxury Experience The crown jewel of Couture by Cavalli is Dubai's pioneering in-building lagoon system, the longest swimmable lagoon ever conceived within a residential tower, creating an aquatic paradise that flows through the podium level like a living river of luxury.

Floating above this aquatic wonderland, the spa sanctuary features floating treatment rooms that seem to hover over crystal-clear waters, offering wellness experiences that transcend the ordinary. The floating juice bar emerges as an oasis of refreshment, accessible by stepping stones that create an almost mythical journey across the lagoon's surface. Managed by the renowned Banyan Group, residents are assured of world-class service and legendary hospitality. Owners also enjoy exclusive privileges, including discounts at Banyan Tree's global resorts, spas, and golf courses, as well as complimentary stays at other properties through the prestigious Owners Exchange Programme. Banyan Tree Residences Creston Hill is more than a home; it's a legacy. A Vision of Unparalleled Harmony: Where Man-made Splendor Meets Natural Grace Our vision for Banyan Tree Residences Creston Hill was to create more than just a home, we sought to craft a timeless sanctuary where the breathtaking beauty of nature and the pinnacle of modern luxury coexist in perfect harmony. We envisioned a place where residents could awaken to the tranquil sounds of the valley, with the majestic backdrop of Khao Yai National Park as their daily vista. This dream became a reality through an architectural philosophy that honors the landscape, creating residences that are not just built on the land but are an integral part of it. The architect's vision was to design spaces that flow seamlessly between indoors and out, dissolving the boundaries between the built environment and the ethereal natural surroundings. Every detail, from the use of organic materials to the expansive windows that frame panoramic views, was meticulously considered to evoke a sense of peace and connection.

The private swimming pools and outdoor areas are not just amenities, but extensions of the living space, inviting residents to immerse themselves in the serenity of their private oasis. This project is the embodiment of a dream: to offer a lifestyle that is both exceptionally refined and profoundly connected to the earth. It is an ode to the dreamers who seek an escape from the ordinary, a place where they can find solace, inspiration, and a deep sense of belonging. The Banyan Tree Residences Creston Hill is the physical manifestation of this ethereal vision, offering a retreat that is as soul-stirring as it is luxurious, where every moment becomes an opportunity to reconnect with both nature and oneself in this extraordinary sanctuary. The development is strategically located to offer both serene seclusion and easy access to Marbella's vibrant social scene, golf courses, and pristine beaches. It represents a unique opportunity to own a piece of paradise in one of Europe's most desirable locations. Where architectural dreams meet an ethereal Mediterranean existence. The DaVinci Tower by Pagani, developed by DarGlobal, signifies a groundbreaking collaboration redefining luxury living in Dubai. Located in Downtown Dubai, this residential masterpiece embodies Pagani's automotive philosophy of precision and exquisite materials translated into an architectural icon. The tower's design seamlessly blends art and engineering, offering residents an immersive, visually stunning, and functionally superior experience. Every detail, from the striking facade to the opulent interiors, reflects meticulous attention. Residences offer an elevated lifestyle with panoramic views of landmarks like the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Canal.

This development transcends luxurious homes, creating a lifestyle destination for the discerning. The tower stands as an innovation beacon, incorporating cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices. The synergy between DarGlobal and Pagani Automobili merges automotive craftsmanship with real estate expertise. This collaboration results in a residential offering that pushes design and luxury boundaries, setting a new benchmark for high-end Dubai properties. The DaVinci Tower is more than a building; it's a statement, a work of art promising an unparalleled living experience. Unparalleled luxury, artistic brilliance, and engineering marvels crafted for the discerning. The DaVinci Tower's vision transcends traditional luxury, aiming for ethereal beauty and groundbreaking design. Inspired by Leonardo da Vinci's ingenuity and Pagani's pursuit of perfection, the tower is conceived as a habitable sculpture, with every detail reflecting artistic mastery and engineering prowess. Architects and designers envision a dreamlike environment, enveloping residents in unparalleled sophistication and comfort. This architectural marvel seamlessly blends form and function, uniting innovative structural elements with breathtaking aesthetics. Interiors are as captivating as the exterior, featuring bespoke furnishings and Pagani's signature style, utilizing carbon fiber, natural wood, and polished metals for refined elegance.

The vision extends beyond aesthetics, fostering an inspiring, deeply personal living experience that cultivates wonder and exclusivity for residents. The DaVinci Tower stands as a testament to creative collaboration, translating hypercar passion into hyper-luxury living. It represents a commitment to pushing residential development boundaries, offering a dream realized in concrete and glass. The essence of Marea Marbella lies in its seamless integration with nature, blurring the lines between indoor splendor and outdoor serenity. Expansive terraces invite the azure sea and sky into your living space, creating an ethereal connection with the natural world. Here, residents can immerse themselves in moments of profound tranquility, whether it's the first light of dawn painting the horizon or the golden hues of sunset reflecting upon the water.

Marea Marbella is not merely a collection of homes, but a sanctuary where dreams unfold against a backdrop of magnificent natural beauty. It embodies a commitment to an elevated existence, where every detail caters to the discerning individual seeking harmony, privacy, and an unmatched sense of place. This development represents the pinnacle of luxurious coastal living, offering a unique opportunity to own a piece of paradise. A Vision Unveiled: Ethereal Beauty, Exquisite Living. Aston Martin The Astera Interiors by Aston Martin Al Marjan Island, UAE aston-martin-al-marjan 2028-12-01 The Astera: Aston Martin Luxury Residences – A Masterpiece of Coastal Grandeur. The Astera, with interiors meticulously crafted by Aston Martin, introduces an extraordinary collection of beachfront residences and villas on the pristine Al Marjan Island in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE. This visionary collaboration between DAR Global and Aston Martin seamlessly integrates cutting-edge design, advanced technology, and unparalleled artisanal craftsmanship into every aspect of these luxurious homes. Each seafront residence is a testament to meticulous attention to detail, reflecting Aston Martin's legendary dedication to precision, beauty, and high performance.

This prestigious development is designed for those who seek an elevated lifestyle where the tranquility of crystal-clear waters meets the thrill of iconic design. Residents are invited to immerse themselves in an environment of unparalleled sophistication and comfort, with direct beachfront access and breathtaking views. The Astera is more than just a home; it is a statement of refined taste, offering an exclusive sanctuary where luxury knows no bounds and every moment is an exquisite indulgence. This isn't just about constructing homes; it's about crafting a legacy where every space resonates with unparalleled elegance, technological innovation, and artistic flair. Les Vagues by Elie Saab: Where Haute Couture Meets Waterfront Luxury in Doha. Discover opulent sea-front residences on a man-made paradise, offering a lifestyle of unmatched elegance and sophistication. Elie Saab Elie Saab Les Vagues Doha, Qatar elie-saab-doha 2026-12-01 Les Vagues by Elie Saab: Unveiling Designer Waterfront Living Les Vagues by Elie Saab presents a branded residential complex offering an unparalleled haute couture living experience in Doha, Qatar. Situated on the exquisite Qetaifan Island North, this development redefines luxury with its opulent sea-front residences, designed to blend seamlessly with the stunning natural surroundings. It promises a lifetime of golden sunsets, where meticulous craftsmanship meets innovative design, creating a truly exceptional environment.

This distinguished complex provides residents with exclusive access to luxurious beach resorts, pristine private beaches, and sophisticated clubhouses. It is engineered for those who appreciate the finer things in life, offering world-class boating facilities that cater to an elite nautical lifestyle. Every aspect of Les Vagues is conceived to deliver a luxurious, well-connected, and aesthetically refined living experience, establishing a new benchmark for waterfront properties in Qatar. Elie Saab's Vision: A Legacy of Craftsmanship and Innovation The vision behind Les Vagues by Elie Saab is to create more than just residences; it is to craft a designer legacy where the timeless artistry of haute couture converges with architectural innovation. Inspired by the ethereal beauty of the sea, the architectural dream is to provide a sanctuary that feels both grand and intimately connected to its serene surroundings, offering residents a unique sense of place and belonging.

This compelling vision translates into interiors meticulously designed by Elie Saab, where every detail reflects exquisite craftsmanship. Shades of creams and grey create a sophisticated palette, complemented by metals with shiny finishes, warm bronze accents, luxurious marble, and premium stone. This careful selection of materials and finishes aims to evoke a sense of opulent calm, ensuring that each residence is not merely a home, but a work of art.

The ultimate aspiration is to offer residents a lifetime of unforgettable moments, punctuated by breathtaking golden sunsets over the light-speckled waters. Les Vagues is envisioned as a seamless blend of natural allure and sophisticated living, where residents can indulge in a lifestyle of unparalleled luxury and tranquility, a true testament to the harmonious marriage of designer elegance and waterfront splendor. Offers a luxurious, well-connected, and aesthetically refined environment Unparalleled Amenities: Elevating Everyday Living to a Haute Couture Experience From state-of-the-art facilities to personalized services, every amenity at Les Vagues is designed for your ultimate comfort and luxury. Signature Amenities for a Life Less Ordinary Les Vagues provides an extensive array of private and communal amenities, ensuring a life of comfort, convenience, and indulgence. Residents have access to a state-of-the-art fitness center, perfect for maintaining a healthy and active lifestyle. The magnificent infinity swimming pool offers a serene escape, providing breathtaking views and a tranquil environment for relaxation and leisure.

The complex is designed with meticulous attention to detail, featuring four personal elevators, including a dedicated service elevator, to ensure seamless access and privacy for all residents. Elegant lounges and sophisticated lobby areas, adorned with bespoke furniture designed by Elie Saab, welcome you and your guests into a world of refined luxury. A 24-hour reception desk is always available, providing comprehensive support and services around the clock.

Beyond the immediate comforts of the residences, Les Vagues integrates luxury retail experiences directly within the complex, allowing for convenient access to exclusive shopping. Ample parking is provided for all units, ensuring ease and security. Furthermore, residents can enjoy the beautifully landscaped community courtyard, which offers stunning sea views and a peaceful outdoor space for relaxation and social gatherings, enhancing the overall living experience. A Visionary Sanctuary: Where Red Sea Horizons and Hejazi Craftsmanship Inspire Every Moment. Drawing inspiration from the tranquil blues of the Red Sea and the intricate artistry of old Jeddah, Raffles Jeddah was conceived as a living masterpiece, an address where tradition and innovation coexist in perfect harmony. The architecture, by DSA Architects International, pays homage to Saudi culture with contemporary lines softened by traditional motifs and a delicate color palette that reflects the surrounding landscape.

Inside, the vision unfolds through luminous spaces adorned with locally sourced art, rich textures, and patterns that echo the rhythms of Hejazi design. Movable mashrabiya screens cast shifting patterns of light and shadow, creating a sense of privacy and poetic connection to the city’s heritage.

Every space, from grand ballrooms to serene meditation terraces, is designed to inspire wonder and belonging. Raffles Jeddah is not just a residence; it is a new landmark for the city, a place where dreams are nurtured and a new chapter of luxury unfolds. The culinary experience is equally exceptional, with three signature restaurants and lounges helmed by internationally acclaimed chefs. From elegant patisserie at Atorie Lounge to the innovative flavors of Surl’O and Riviera, dining at Raffles is a celebration of global and local cuisine.

For special occasions, the Pearl Ballroom and Crystal Room provide breathtaking venues with panoramic sea or city views, complemented by a dedicated wedding showroom and a private bridal suite with direct spa access. Every gathering, from intimate family celebrations to grand events, is elevated by Raffles’ legendary service and attention to detail. Jeddah’s Most Coveted Address Directly on the Corniche waterfront, overlooking the Red Sea
Minutes to Red Sea Mall and premier shopping destinations
Close to historic Al-Balad (Old Jeddah) and cultural landmarks
Easy access to King Abdulaziz International Airport
Adjacent to lush gardens and seaside promenades
Near leading international schools and medical centers
Surrounded by fine dining and entertainment venues
Direct connection to Jeddah’s business and financial districts
Steps from art galleries and museums
Seamless access to the main city transport arteries Visionary Excellence by DSA Architects International. DSA Architects International DSA Architects International, the creative force behind Raffles Jeddah, is renowned for delivering landmark projects that blend cultural authenticity with contemporary luxury. Their commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect of this development, from the grand architectural vision to the smallest design detail.

With a deep respect for Jeddah’s heritage and a forward-thinking approach, DSA Architects International has crafted a destination that honors the city’s past while embracing its dynamic future. The result is a sanctuary where tradition and innovation coexist, offering residents and guests an unparalleled lifestyle experience.

By partnering with the prestigious Raffles brand, DSA Architects International ensures that every resident enjoys legendary service, world-class amenities, and a sense of belonging, setting a new benchmark for luxury living in Saudi Arabia.

developer name: Vimarn Suriya Co., Ltd (Dusit International & Central Pattana JV)
Project description:
Urban Living, Redefined: Dusit Parkside at Central Park Experience vibrant city life with parkside tranquility. Modern luxury, unmatched convenience, Bangkok’s new lifestyle destination. Dusit Dusit Parkside Silom, Thailand dusit-parkside-bangkok 2025-01-01 Exclusive Experiences Return to Bangkok’s Most Desirable Address Dusit Parkside at Central Park is a bold new chapter in Bangkok’s luxury residential scene, seamlessly blending contemporary design with the city’s lush green heart. As part of the iconic Dusit Central Park mixed-use development, Dusit Parkside offers a dynamic lifestyle for urban professionals, young families, and global citizens seeking the perfect balance of energy and serenity.

Set within a 69-story landmark tower, Dusit Parkside comprises 246 elegantly appointed homes ranging from one to three bedrooms, each crafted to maximize space, natural light, and panoramic views of Lumpini Park and the city skyline. The interiors reflect a “Lifestyle Luxury” ethos, modern, playful, and sophisticated, where premium materials and thoughtful layouts create an inviting sense of home.

Residents enjoy direct access to a world of amenities, including a grand lobby, private sky lounge, and a 36-meter lap pool overlooking the park. As part of the larger Dusit Central Park community, Dusit Parkside is connected to luxury retail, five-star hospitality, and premium office spaces, all just steps from Silom and Rama IV’s vibrant urban core.

Dusit Parkside is more than a residence, it’s a gateway to a new way of living in Bangkok, where every day brings the best of city life and the peace of a parkside retreat. A Bold New Vision for Integrated Urban Living Dusit Parkside was conceived as a celebration of modern city living, where the pulse of Bangkok meets the calming embrace of nature. The architects envisioned a vertical village—an address that fosters connection, creativity, and well-being for residents of all ages.

Inspired by the energy of Silom and the serenity of Lumpini Park, Dusit Parkside’s design philosophy centers on openness, flexibility, and comfort. Expansive windows frame sweeping views, while interiors by renowned designers blend natural wood, playful colors, and sophisticated furnishings to create a home that feels both vibrant and relaxing.

Six Senses Six Senses Residences The Forestias Bangkok, Thailand six-senses-bangkok 2025-05-01 Six Senses Residences The Forestias: Luxurious Living Immersed in Bangkok’s Lush Woodland Sanctuary Six Senses Residences The Forestias is an extraordinary collection of just 27 private homes, set within a purpose-grown forest on the outskirts of Bangkok. Conceived as a complete escape, yet within easy reach of the city, these residences are part of an intergenerational lifestyle destination that redefines luxury through a deep connection with nature and holistic wellness.

Each home is thoughtfully positioned around an enchanting woodland lagoon, offering three to five bedrooms and expansive living spaces ranging from 791 to 1,480 square meters (8,514 to 15,931 sq ft). The interiors are a contemporary haven, featuring Bulthaup kitchens, Gessi bathroom accessories, and seamless integration with the lush forest surroundings. Every residence includes a private pool, a rejuvenating onsen, and organic gardens for cultivating seasonal fruits and vegetables.

Residents enjoy direct access to a treetop canopy walk, connecting them to the abundant wellness and leisure amenities of The Forestias. This elevated platform traverses a central green home to over 500 species of plants and animals, creating a living ecosystem that enhances every aspect of daily life.

The Forestias is developed around the Miyawaki Method of reforestation, ensuring a thriving, resilient habitat that supports cleaner air, cooler environments, and a true sense of tranquility. This is not just a place to live, it is a new way to experience community, sustainability, and wellbeing in Bangkok. A Vision of Harmony: Reconnecting Urban Life with Nature Through Sustainable Innovation Driven by the goal to foster perfect harmony between people and nature, Six Senses Residences The Forestias is envisioned as a living sanctuary that seamlessly integrates both. Drawing on the expertise of Foster + Partners, DT Designs Corporation Limited, and TK Studio, the project is designed as a prototype resilient district that enhances health, happiness, and sustainability for generations to come.

Inspired by the rhythms of the forest, each residence is crafted to blur the boundaries between indoors and outdoors. Expansive windows, organic materials, and private gardens invite the sights and sounds of nature into every moment, fostering a sense of peace and belonging. The treetop canopy walk and woodland lagoon are not just amenities, they are daily invitations to reconnect with the natural world.

ritz-carlton-tampa Ritz-Carlton, Tampa At The Ritz-Carlton Residences a dedicated concierge team ensures every need is met while a spacious amenity deck features a swimming pool, spa, and curated food and beverage options for ultimate relaxation. Wellness takes center stage with on-demand spa treatments, steam rooms, saunas, and a state-of-the-art fitness studio. For recreation, residents can enjoy a media lounge with a golf simulator, pickleball and tennis courts set within lush gardens, and a dedicated children’s playroom. The pet-friendly community also includes a landscaped dog park and dog-washing stations. Guests are accommodated in two luxurious suites, and residents can take advantage of a complimentary continental breakfast every morning. 24/7 valet, doorman, and security services ensure privacy, convenience, and peace of mind in Tampa’s most exclusive waterfront address.

Legendary Ritz-Carlton staff and service
Personalized concierge to assist residents and their guests
A large amenity deck with swimming pool, spa, and food and beverage options
Treatment rooms offering on-demand spa services in a serene atmosphere
State-of-the-art gym and fitness studio
Media lounge with golf simulator
Pickleball and tennis court set within lush gardens
Dedicated dog washing stations and landscaped dog park
2 luxurious guest suites
Complimentary continental breakfast every morning

the-standard-miami The Standard Residences, Miami The Standard Residences Midtown Miami is designed for those who crave a dynamic lifestyle infused with modern convenience and social energy. Spanning 12 floors, the development features 40,000 square feet of curated amenities, seamlessly blending work, wellness, and leisure. A stunning rooftop deck awaits, complete with a resort-style swimming pool, whirlpool spa, poolside cabanas, and an outdoor rain shower, all complemented by a globally inspired rooftop restaurant and bar with poolside service. The vibrant social floor offers a lounge, gourmet kitchen, karaoke bar, and pickleball court—ideal for gatherings and celebrations. Residents can also enjoy a private screening room, co-working spaces, and a boardroom, ensuring every aspect of life is covered. 

Amenities included:
Tropically landscaped, resort-style rooftop deck featuring a 60-foot-long swimming pool, whirlpool spa, pool-side cabanas, and outdoor rain showers
Global-inspired rooftop restaurant and bar with poolside service and on-demand deliv- ery to residences
High-definition private screening room with cutting-edge audiovisual equipment
Vibrant social floor with spacious lounge, karaoke bar, and gourmet kitchen and bar
Sweat floor with state-of-the-art, fully equipped fitness center, outdoor yoga terrace, indoor yoga and meditation studio, infrared saunas, and pickleball court
Work floor with co-working spaces
Pet friendly community with grooming spa

st-regis-miami-brickell-bay St Regis, Miami St. Regis Brickell Bay offers an extraordinary collection of wellness, fitness, dining, and entertainment amenities, creating a private residential resort defined by the brand’s legendary hospitality. Bask in the longest infinity pool in South Florida at the Sunset Pool Deck, where the stunning backdrop of Miami Beach enhances every moment. For those who crave the beachfront lifestyle, private cabanas, chaise lounges, umbrellas, and an indoor-outdoor beach grill and bar provide an indulgent escape. Elevating the experience further, the Ellipse Club offers private dining with a chef’s kitchen, a sophisticated Cognac Room, and a golf simulator for leisurely afternoons. Residents can also unwind with His & Hers full spa treatments in the state-of-the-art wellness center, while a dedicated pet spa ensures their furry companions receive the same level of pampering.

Amenities included:
70,000+ sq. ft. of luxury amenities
Longest infinity pool in South Florida
Private beach service
Ellipse Club featuring a private dining room with a chef’s kitchen
Cognac Room
Golf simulator
His & Hers full spa treatments in the state-of-the-art wellness center
Pet spa
Guest suites in both North and South towers

jumeirah-living-dubai-business-bay Jumeirah Living, Dubai Jumeirah Living Business Bay reimagines urban luxury, blending the prestige of waterfront living with the signature hospitality of the world-renowned Jumeirah brand. Rising above the Dubai Canal in the heart of Business Bay, this striking tower offers residents a sanctuary of sophistication, wellness, and leisure. Every detail is meticulously curated, from the panoramic views of Downtown Dubai and the Burj Khalifa to the resort-style amenities that transform daily life into an exclusive retreat. Here, relaxation and recreation are seamlessly intertwined: unwind in the lavish spa, take a dip in one of several swimming pools, or enjoy a private screening in the cinema. The development’s wellness and fitness facilities cater to every lifestyle, while dedicated spaces for children, business, and social gatherings ensure that every member of the family feels at home. With round-the-clock concierge and housekeeping, direct access to the canal promenade, and a host of personalized services, Jumeirah Living Business Bay delivers a lifestyle where comfort, convenience, and elegance converge in Dubai’s most dynamic district.

one-and-only-dubai One&Only, Dubai One Za'abeel is a bold architectural landmark in the heart of Dubai’s financial district. Featuring two striking towers connected by "The Link," the world’s longest cantilevered structure, it redefines the city’s skyline. This luxury development blends residential, commercial, and leisure spaces with stunning views of iconic landmarks like the Burj Khalifa. One Za'abeel offers an extraordinary living experience, providing residents with unparalleled convenience, comfort, and style, all within a visionary and contemporary design.

Premium dining options

This exclusive residential retreat offers architecturally striking villas that blend local charm with contemporary elegance, all designed to harmonize with the rugged beauty of the island. With just a limited number of private homes, residents enjoy utmost privacy while indulging in curated services and experiences reserved for the One&Only lifestyle.

A 20-meter private pool, two outdoor showers nestled in lush greenery, and a cozy fire pit with ample seating set the stage for relaxation and intimate gatherings. For those who love al fresco living, a spacious outdoor dining area, a fully equipped bar, and a dedicated yoga pavilion complete the experience, offering the perfect balance of luxury, tranquility, and effortless sophistication.

rosewood-beverly-hills Rosewood, Beverly Hills Situated on Santa Monica Boulevard, Rosewood Residences Beverly Hills epitomizes ultra-luxury living in Southern California. This boutique development features 17 meticulously designed residences by renowned designer Thomas Juul-Hansen, blending timeless elegance with casual sophistication. Ranging from 3,000 to over 7,000 square feet, each home offers expansive indoor and outdoor living spaces, seamlessly integrating comfort with opulence. Residents enjoy unparalleled privacy and exclusivity, complemented by bespoke services and amenities that cater to the most discerning tastes.

the-standard-miami The Standard Residences, Miami The Standard Residences Midtown Miami is designed for those who crave a dynamic lifestyle infused with modern convenience and social energy. Spanning 12 floors, the development features 40,000 square feet of curated amenities, seamlessly blending work, wellness, and leisure. A stunning rooftop deck awaits, complete with a resort-style swimming pool, whirlpool spa, poolside cabanas, and an outdoor rain shower, all complemented by a globally inspired rooftop restaurant and bar with poolside service. Residents can also enjoy a private screening room, co-working spaces, and a boardroom, ensuring every aspect of life is covered.

The Majlis is a central part of Emirati life. Community and ceremony will therefore be foremost at Six Senses The Palm, Dubai, enhanced by cultural and social spaces such as restaurants, bars, pool, kids’ club, games room, library, function rooms, and meeting rooms.

st-regis-miami-brickell-bay St Regis, Miami St. Regis Brickell Bay offers an extraordinary collection of wellness, fitness, dining, and entertainment amenities, creating a private residential resort defined by the brand’s legendary hospitality. Bask in the longest infinity pool in South Florida at the Sunset Pool Deck, where the stunning backdrop of Miami Beach enhances every moment. For those who crave the beachfront lifestyle, private cabanas, chaise lounges, umbrellas, and an indoor-outdoor beach grill and bar provide an indulgent escape.
